cemetery_data.name: dumptyd
cemetery_data.description:
Here lies dumptyd, in rest, finally. A mediocre software developer who had bad hygiene and no hobbies.

He was born too late to explore the Earth and born too early to explore the Space.

His last words were: "How can I be like repmovsd?".

cemetery_data.name: raincrash
cemetery_data.description:
Here lies good old raincrash. A great big rock fell on his head. A virtuous software developer.

He was born too late to explore the Earth and born too early to explore the Space.

His last words were: "Don't worry. It's not loaded".

cemetery_data.name: V
cemetery_data.description:
Here lies V, in rest, finally. A mediocre software developer, wannabe Rockstar coder and a failed artist.

He was born too late to explore the Earth and born too early to explore the Space.

His last words: "How do I up my meme game?".

cemetery_data.name: ox
cemetery_data.description:
Here lies ox, in rest, finally. Christian, father, and a loving husband.

His only dream was to become a pigeon.

His last words: "Mid missing.".

cemetery_data.name: AllieX
cemetery_data.description:
Here lies AllieX, in rest and wearing the pink glasses, finally. Avid technophile, wannabe-mathematician-politican-writer-musician.

Her only dream was to be loved unconditionally.

Her last words: "Go Team Haskell.".

cemetery_data.name: Arion Miles
cemetery_data.description:
Here lies Arion Miles, in rest, finally. A no-name wannabe Pythonista.

His only contribution to this world was making a platform agnostic Automated Torrent Setup, about which he wouldn't shutup.

His last words: "What's this on my dick?".

cemetery_data.name: Satan
cemetery_data.description:
Here lies Satan, in rest, finally. A wannabe full-stack developer with sexual attraction to Game Development.

All he wanted to do was to take over the slack from V, but it had been only 4 days since he joined.

His last words were: "Ayy bb".

cemetery_data.name: Wojak
cemetery_data.description:
Here lies Wojak, in rest, finally. A mediocre programmer with no hobbies, no life and lots of depressing feels.

He dreamed of reaching lord repmovsd's level, but that didn't happen.

His last words were: "I don't want to feel this feel anymore".

cemetery_data.name: SlapBot
cemetery_data.description:
Here lies SlapBot, in rest, finally. A multi purpose tool guy.

He created a shit virtual assistant called Stephanie, a multi purpose assistant girl.

His last words: "Stop going to kallege, i am pru in devops by reading APIs".

cemetery_data.name: Frag O'Matic
cemetery_data.description:
Here lies Frag, in rest, finally. A prolific shitposter when on the clock.

Last of the clan that could read and write all forms of unmanaged code, he met his end fighting a hoarde of webcancer-n00bs.

His last words: "

npm install teach_yourself_a_real_language.js
".

cemetery_data.name: g33kyaditya
cemetery_data.description:
Here lies g33kyaditya, in rest, finally in peace. A pleb programmer who refused to learn anything JS.

He liked shitposting and gifting expensive cakes.

His famous last words were: "Chaccha youthoober hein humarey!".

cemetery_data.name: Ashutosh
cemetery_data.description:
Here lies Ashutosh, after a lot of FML situations. A curious guy who killed with existential crisis. Give this guy a lot of hate. I think he is rick in real life.

He likes to talk with non living people.

His famous last words were: "Nobody exists on purpose, everybody is going to die in the end.".
